question.text: You are driving towards a zebra crossing. A person in a wheelchair is waiting to cross. What should you do?

explanation.text: You should slow down and be prepared to stop as you would with an able-bodied person. Don’t wave them across as other traffic may not stop.

answer.text: Wave to the person to cross
Wave to the person to wait
